name: Moss Original Game Soundtrack
summary: A melodic and playful adventure score conveys Quill's story in Moss from her perspective by employing small and intimate-sounding instruments – flute, oboe, Celtic harp, English hammered dulcimer, acoustic guitar, and classical violin – all composed, arranged and produced in a pastoral soundscape with enchanting Waltz-esque flair.
info:
• 艺术家: Malukah
  • 作曲: Jason Graves
  • 版本特性: digital
  • 发售日期: 2018-08-03
  • 价格: 9.99 USD
  • 播放时长: 58m
  • 厂牌: Materia Collective
